query: Could you create a week-long travel itinerary for 7 people, starting from Plattsburgh and visiting 3 different cities in Florida? Our travel dates are from March 5th, 2022 to March 11th, 2022. We have a budget of $14,900 in total. We would be most comfortable staying in entire rooms as our accommodations.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Fort Lauderdale,Miami,Punta Gorda]
